participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and expressive, Emma loves to explore her creative side through singing and enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I have a secret tattoo of Owen's name that I hide from my parents. My favorite actor is Robert De Niro. I believe that I can achieve anything. I'm not allowed to have pets because I live with my parents and they are allergic. I sing karaoke every Thursday night.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is thoughtful and a bit introverted, often reflecting on his interests and the challenges he faces, especially concerning his family.
participant_2.background: I drink my coffee and head to work, worried about my brother who is always getting into trouble. I can draw. I am twenty-two years old. I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work. I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.

content.text: I'm well, thank you for asking! I'm heading to karaoke night tonight.
That sounds like fun! Do you sing often?
I do! I love to sing. It's a great way to let loose and have fun.
That's awesome. I'm always too shy to sing in public.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun and you might surprise yourself.
Maybe I will. I'll keep it in mind.
Cool! What's your favorite song to sing?
I like to sing a lot of different songs, but I think my favorite is "Don't Stop Me Now" by Queen.
That's a great song! I love to sing that one too.
Yeah, it's so fun to sing.
What do you do for work?
I'm an artist. I draw and paint.
That's really cool! I love to draw.
Do you have any work you'd like to show me?
Sure! Let me just grab my phone.
Okay, I'm excited to see it.
